actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to provide that medallions struck on the reactivated Carson City Dollar Press by the Nevada American Revolution Bicentennial Commission shall be national commemorative medals.

summary.text: States that medallions struck on the reactivated Carson City dollar press prior to June 30, 1977, by the Nevada American Revolution Bicentennial Commission shall be national commemorative medals.

titles.title: A bill to provide that medallions struck on the reactivated Carson City Dollar Press by the Nevada American Revolution Bicentennial Commission shall be national commemorative medals.
